name: Desolation (itch)
description:
My first game I made on Unity for Android. I am interested to hear your feedback.

Desolation is a fascinating maze without walls. There is only you and the void.

 Genre:

Maze, casual

 

Platform:

Android (4.1 & higher)

 

Description:

A unique and exciting puzzle game in the style of a maze, where there are no walls. Try not to fall into the void with the chosen path.

Go through all 50 levels. Use black holes to move between levels.

The game is made in black and white tones, which will plunge you into the mysterious world of the wasteland.

 

GAME FEATURES:

- 50 unique handmade levels.

- A black and white game that does not distract from anything.

- Full immersion in the world of Desolation.

- (hint) In some levels you can see both past and future levels.

 

Use the accelerometer to control it.

 

I look forward to your feedback.;)

 

Download in Google Play:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.Denimaks.Desolationn
